医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
突破性的 X 射线增敏剂可能会彻底改变癌症患者的放射治疗厦门大学的研究人员通过开发一类新型 X 射线增敏剂 (XS)，可以彻底改变放射治疗，在癌症治疗方面取得了重大进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Breakthrough-X-ray-sensitizers-could-revolutionize-radiotherapy-for-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Breakthrough-X-ray-sensitizers-could-revolutionize-radiotherapy-for-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ed4e71d-8b7b-4bea-9087-ceea7bd94303 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 21:17:04 -0400 Breakthrough X-ray-sensitizers could revolutionize radiotherapy for cancer patients
强大的可视化技术为理解人类肌肉收缩提供了新的见解在整个生命王国中，神经系统和肌肉之间的联系发展不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Powerful-visualization-technologies-offer-new-insight-into-understanding-muscle-contraction-in- humans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Powerful-visualization-technologies-offer-new-insight-into-understanding-muscle-contraction-in- humans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed57a9a0-7b33-4c10-9532-e1d09a57f9c6 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 21:13:03 -0400 Powerful visualization technologies offer new insight into understanding muscle contraction in humans
新方法有效地将干细胞转化为内皮细胞用于心血管研究血管的最内层由内皮细胞形成，内皮细胞反过来在心血管系统疾病的发展中发挥作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/New-method-efficiently-converts-stem-cells-to-endothelial-cells-for-cardioangio-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/New-method-efficiently-converts-stem-cells-to-endothelial-cells-for-cardioangio-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d369ae3-c18c-4a43-83e4-a3c08606a91a Wed, 31 Jul 2024 21:05:01 -0400 New method efficiently converts stem cells to endothelial cells for cardiovascular research
常用麻醉药物可恢复与癫痫有关的离子通道功能特定离子通道的突变变异会导致难以治疗的癫痫症。现在发表在《自然》杂志上的一项研究表明，常用的麻醉药物异丙酚可以恢复该离子通道的功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Commonly-used-anesthetic-drug-can-restore-the-function-of-ion-channel-linked-to-epilepsy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Commonly-used-anesthetic-drug-can-restore-the-function-of-ion-channel-linked-to-epilepsy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2b3a63c-2779-47c8-a3a3-ffc3322227e6 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 20:50:00 -0400 Commonly used anesthetic drug can restore the function of ion channel linked to epilepsy
人工智能增强脑电图分析为早期痴呆症检测铺平道路梅奥诊所的科学家正在使用人工智能 (AI) 和机器学习来更快、更准确地分析脑电图 (EEG) 测试，使神经科医生能够在通常未经检查的数据中发现痴呆症的早期迹象。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/AI-enhanced-EEG-analysis-paves-way-for-early-dementia-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/AI-enhanced-EEG-analysis-paves-way-for-early-dementia-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2910e501-4cc5-4116-892b-ad6723a65175 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 20:44:27 -0400 AI-enhanced EEG analysis paves way for early dementia detection
胶质母细胞瘤附近有效免疫细胞的发现开辟了新的治疗途径胶质母细胞瘤是一种高度侵袭性、通常无法治愈的脑肿瘤。如果所有治疗方案都用尽，患者的平均预期寿命将不到两年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Discovery-of-pot-immune-cells-near-glioblastomas-opens-new-avenues-for-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Discovery-of-pot-immune-cells-near-glioblastomas-opens-new-avenues-for-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6a0ac6c-306e-476e-a1fe-a8d6028b5f88 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 20:39:42 -0400 Discovery of potent immune cells near glioblastomas opens new avenues for treatment
AI模型利用血液激素水平预测男性不育风险根据世界卫生组织 (WHO) 的一项研究（2017 年），大约一半的不孕症是由男性造成的。精液分析被认为对于诊断男性不育症至关重要，但除了专门治疗不育症的医疗机构外，精液分析并不容易获得，而且接受门槛很高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/AI-model-predicts-male-infertility-risk-using-blood-hormone-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/AI-model-predicts-male-infertility-risk-using-blood-hormone-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4486db53-8154-4219-a77d-0fabf19d3631 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 20:32:52 -0400 AI model predicts male infertility risk using blood hormone levels
新研究表明，禽流感病例未被发现。这对我们所有人来说都是一个问题。一项新的研究加剧了人们的担忧，即感染禽流感的畜牧工人比报道的要多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Bird-flu-cases-are-going-unDetected-new-study-suggests-Ite28099s-a-problem-for-all-of-us.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Bird-flu-cases-are-going-undetected-new-study-suggests-Ite28099s-a-problem-for-all-of-us.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da423fdd-3364-41a8-81d2-116d22c5383f Wed, 31 Jul 2024 20:25:47 -0400 Bird flu cases are going undetected, new study suggests. It’s a problem for all of us.
研究发现，神经分歧儿童到 18 岁时面临慢性致残性疲劳的风险更高童年时期的神经分化特征使 18 岁时患慢性致残性疲劳的风险增加一倍，其中炎症发挥着重要的中介作用。这凸显了解决炎症标志物在管理神经分歧个体健康方面的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Neurodivergent-children-face-higher-risk-of-chronic-disabling-fatigue-by-18-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Neurodivergent-children-face-higher-risk-of-chronic-disabling-fatigue-by-18-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba7d7470-f95c-4c31-8f47-d85c6b829ae4 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 19:43:00 -0400 Neurodivergent children face higher risk of chronic disabling fatigue by 18, study finds
纯素饮食可能延缓衰老在健康双胞胎中，与杂食性饮食相比，纯素饮食对表观遗传衰老显示出短期益处，并且纯素组中观察到的表观遗传年龄指标降低。然而，两种饮食的端粒长度和总体有丝分裂时钟值保持不变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Vegan-diet-may-slow-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Vegan-diet-may-slow-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99f3c545-d0cf-4b47-966c-a748cd8fb9fb Wed, 31 Jul 2024 19:35:00 -0400 Vegan diet may slow aging
